survey_brief: This survey aims to assess student satisfaction with campus food services, including quality, variety, and accessibility of food options.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the campus food services in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Helps segment respondents by frequency of use.

script.question_text: How often do you use the campus food services in a typical week?

questions.question_text: Which of the following campus food service locations do you visit most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following campus food service locations do you visit most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of food provided by campus food services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Single-choice radio buttons are recommended.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of food provided by campus food services?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for campus food services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for campus food services?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of dietary-specific options (e.g., vegan, gluten-free) to you?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice radio buttons for clarity. Helps assess demand for specialized dietary options.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of dietary-specific options (e.g., vegan, gluten-free) to you?
